page.title: 18SCHOOLS IN HELSTON (2)
page.content: When the comprehensive was created new buildings were added which now form the site of the Upper School. The first Headmaster of the new comprehensive is {Mr A.S. Worrall}who was created an O.B.E. in 1984 for services to education and the community in general. During 1985 a new indoor swimming pool and squash courts are being added for use by all the local schools and the community. As the Royal Naval Air Station at Culdrose expanded it was necessary to build two new junior schools,Parc Eglos and Nansloe, and in 1983, the two St Michael's schools were joined together to make one school. The school today has about 320 pupils and 11 teachers.
